attributes.action: Make HSCT Treatment freely available to victims of Multiple Sclerosis
attributes.additional_details: Considering the undeniable succes of HSCT in the treatment of MS in countries including the USA, Israel and Russia, why is the British Government so slow to encourage the use HSCT in the UK. Particularly when there are so many hospitals in the UK already familiar with successfully carrying out bone marrow transplants (since the 1990's)
